 417:   '''
 418:   Description
 419:   -----------
 420:     Finds the finite difference weights, w_i, such that 
 421: 
 422:       L[f(x)] \approx \sum_i w_i*f(n_i)
 423: 
 424:     where n_i are the provided nodes and L is a differential operaotor
 425:     specified with the diff argument.  The weights are found by
 426:     assuming that the function, f(x), consists of a linear combination
 427:     of M monomial terms, p_i(x), and radial basis functions, r(x),
 428:     with N centers, c_i
 429: 
 430:       f(x) = \sum_i a_i*r(||x - c_i||) + \sum_i b_i*p_i(x)
 431: 
 432:     To ensure an equal number of equations and unknown parameters, we
 433:     add M constaints to the parameters a_i
 434:     
 435:       \sum_i a_i*p_j(n_i) = 0.
 436: 
 437:     The weights are then found by solving the following linear system
 438:  
 439:       | r(||n_0-c_0||) ... r(||n_N-c_0||) p_0(n_0) ... p_M(n_0) |    
 440:       |       :         :        :          :             :     | 
 441:       | r(||n_0-c_N||) ... r(||n_N-c_N||) p_0(n_N) ... p_M(n_N) | w = d    
 442:       |    p_0(n_0)    ...    p_0(n_N)                          |    
 443:       |       :        ...       :                  0           |    
 444:       |    p_M(n_0)    ...    p_M(n_N)                          |    
 445: 
 446:     where d is
 447: 
 448:           | L[r(||y-c_o||)]|_y=x |
 449:           |         :            |
 450:       d = | L[r(||y-c_N||)]|_y=x |
 451:           |    L[p_0(y)]|_y=x    |
 452:           |         :            |
 453:           |    L[p_M(y)]|_y=x    |
 454: 
 455: 
 456:   Parameters
 457:   ----------
 458:     x: 
 459:     nodes:
 460:     diff:
 461:     centers:
 462:     basis:
 463:     order:
 464:     eps:
 465: 
 466:   '''
